info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 9:57PM CDT until August 06 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Jefferson County in south central Illinois... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 957 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Irvington, or near Centralia, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mount Vernon, Bluford and Dix. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 97 and 105. Interstate 64 in Illinois between Mile Markers 63 and 72. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central Illinois.
